attributes.action: make Mike O'Sullivan the Supreme Ruler of the Universe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned urge the Prime Minister to create a new position on the cabinet, entitled 'Superme Ruler of the Universe', and that the first incumbent of this position be Mike O'Sullivan.
The holder of this position would be entitled to an annual salary of £40,000,000 and allowed to put Sunderland back into the Premier League every year, even when they get relegated. He would also be allowed to eat and drink as much as he wants without getting fat, and he should be allowed to have a go on Kylie at least once a month.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
